attributes.action: Sack Maria Miller for expenses claim
attributes.additional_details:
Maria Miller to be sacked:

The parliamentary commissioner for standards, who conducted an investigation into the culture secretary's expenses, ruled she should repay £45,800 after falsely claiming expenses. This was cut this to £5,800 by the House of Commons Committee on Standards.

rejection.details: This is a matter for the Parliamentary Authorities, not DCMS.
